questions_and_answers.question: In the event of an arc flash causing eye irritation, which of the following actions should be taken immediately?
options: A. Rub the affected eye vigorously
B. Apply a strong eye drop without consulting a doctor
C. Ignore the injury and continue working
D. Raise the injured part above the body level
E. Pressure on the wound to stop bleeding
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: D. Raise the injured part above the body level

questions_and_answers.question: In case of an electric shock, which of the following actions should be performed to break the contact with the electric supply?
options: A. Directly touch the victim with bare hands
B. Apply first aid to burns before restoring breathing
C. Pull the person away using uninsulated tools or body parts
D. Stand on wet ground while breaking the contact
E. Do not disconnect the contact as soon as possible
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: E. Do not disconnect the contact as soon as possible

questions_and_answers.question: What is the best immediate action in case of a severe bleeding from an abdominal stab wound?
options: A. Apply pressure on the wound and cover it with a clean pad
B. Keep the injured part below the level of the body
C. Rub the affected area vigorously to stop the bleeding
D. Ignore the injury and wait for professional help
E. Bandage the wounded area without applying any pressure
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: A. Apply pressure on the wound and cover it with a clean pad

questions_and_answers.question: In the event of an arc flash causing eye irritation, the appropriate first aid measure is to:
options: A. Rub the eyes vigorously with bare hands
B. Apply a strong eye drop solution multiple times daily
C. Seek immediate medical attention from an eye specialist
D. Flush the eyes with water for several minutes
E. Use over-the-counter eye drops without consulting a doctor
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Seek immediate medical attention from an eye specialist

questions_and_answers.question: During first aid treatment, if a person has been electrocuted and is still in contact with the electric supply, the best course of action to break the contact is to:
options: A. Immediately wrap hands in dry material and pull the person away from the source
B. Pour cold water on the affected area to reduce burn severity
C. Call for help and keep the patient warm until medical assistance arrives
D. Apply pressure to stop bleeding if the injury is severe
E. Stand on an insulating material and break the contact by pushing or pulling the person free
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: E. Stand on an insulating material and break the contact by pushing or pulling the person free

questions_and_answers.question: During an arc flash incident, a worker sustains an eye injury due to the flying particles. The best immediate action for this situation is:
options: A. Rub the affected eye vigorously.
B. Apply a strong chemical solution directly into the eye.
C. Consult with an eye doctor immediately and avoid touching the eye at all costs.
D. Use water to flush the eye continuously.
E. Apply ice packs on the affected eye to reduce swelling.
F. Placeholder Option
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Consult with an eye doctor immediately and avoid touching the eye at all costs.
